hero.title: GD4
hero.desc: {{count}} AI agents specialized in civil construction document validation. From company registrations to safety certifications, from technical registrations to payroll reports — each agent is trained for a specific document type.

what.title: What are GD4
what.p1: GD4 Agents are specialized artificial intelligence systems that automate the validation of mandatory documents in civil construction. Each agent is trained to analyze a specific document type — from federal tax certificates to NR-35 safety certifications — and validate whether it is complete, correct, and in compliance with current legislation.
what.p2text: They cover the 4 fundamental compliance categories in construction: documents for
what.p2end: An orchestrator agent coordinates all others and generates a consolidated compliance score.
what.boxDesc: Represents the fourth evolution in document management: from paper to digital, from digital to cloud, from cloud to automation, and from automation to autonomous artificial intelligence.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From upload to validation in 4 steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Supplier uploads the document via web platform or GD4 Obra app
howItWorks.step2Desc: The Orchestrator identifies the type and activates the specialized agent
howItWorks.step3Desc: The agent extracts data, cross-references with official databases, and validates compliance
howItWorks.step4Desc: Approved or rejected with technical justification in real time

agents.title: The
agents.subtitle: Organized by document category. Each agent is a specialist trained to validate a specific type of civil construction document.

agents.name: Registration Validator
agents.desc: Queries Federal Revenue, verifies registration status, activity codes, and corporate structure

agents.name: Federal Tax Clearance
agents.desc: Validates Negative Debt Certificate with Federal Revenue and Attorney General's Office

agents.name: FGTS Compliance
agents.desc: Verifies FGTS Compliance Certificate with the Federal Savings Bank

agents.name: Labor Clearance
agents.desc: Validates Negative Labor Debt Certificate with the Superior Labor Court

agents.name: Articles of Incorporation
agents.desc: Extracts data from articles of incorporation, verifies business purpose compatibility

agents.name: Health Certificate
agents.desc: Verifies Occupational Health Certificate (NR-7), fitness, and expiration date

agents.name: NR-18 — Safety
agents.desc: Validates Construction Safety training certificate

agents.name: NR-35 — Height Work
agents.desc: Verifies height work certificate, training hours, and validity

agents.name: NR-10 — Electrical
agents.desc: Validates Electrical Installation and Service Safety certificate

agents.name: NR-33 — Confined Spaces
agents.desc: Verifies confined space work certificate and authorization

agents.name: PPE Record
agents.desc: Validates Personal Protective Equipment delivery and signature (NR-6)

agents.name: Worker Onboarding
agents.desc: Verifies site onboarding certificate and admissional training

agents.name: ART — CREA
agents.desc: Validates Technical Responsibility Annotation, responsible party, and scope at CREA

agents.name: RRT — CAU
agents.desc: Verifies Technical Responsibility Record for architects at CAU

agents.name: Construction Permit
agents.desc: Validates permit issued by city hall, project scope, and expiration date

agents.name: Environmental License
agents.desc: Verifies environmental license (LP, LI, LO), conditions, and issuing authority

agents.name: GFIP / SEFIP
agents.desc: Analyzes FGTS Collection Guide and Social Security Information

agents.name: GPS — Social Security
agents.desc: Verifies Social Security Payment Guide, amounts, and period

agents.name: Electronic Invoices
agents.desc: Validates electronic service invoices, ISS, and withholdings

agents.name: Tax Withholdings
agents.desc: Verifies withholding receipts for INSS 11%, IR, CSLL, PIS, and COFINS

agents.name: GD4 Orchestrator
agents.desc: Coordinates all 20 agents, generates consolidated compliance report and risk score

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.subtitle: Real results from clients using GD4 Agents

environmental.title: Environmental Impact
environmental.subtitle: Digitization that's good for the planet

items.label: Water saved
items.desc: Liters of water saved in production

items.label: LIVE
items.title: Automatic Document Validation
items.desc: 21 agents validating company registrations, tax clearances, health certificates, safety certs, technical registrations, payroll reports, invoices, and more.

items.label: LIVE
items.title: Smart Expiration Alerts
items.desc: Automatic notifications 30, 15, and 7 days before each document expires.

items.label: BETA
items.title: Continuous Learning
items.desc: Agents that learn from every validation, improving accuracy and reducing false positives.

items.label: Q3 2026
items.title: Predictive Risk Analysis
items.desc: Prediction of non-compliance before it happens, based on historical supplier patterns.

items.label: Q4 2026
items.title: Conversational Agents
items.desc: Chat interaction with suppliers to automatically request missing documents.

cta.title: See GD4 Agents in action
cta.description: Schedule a demo and discover how {{count}} AI agents can automate document validation for your construction company.
